history.proof: intros l target. induction l. - simpl. apply AAO_nil. - destruct a. + destruct (acknowledged_op_dec k l). * simpl. shelve. * destruct (in_dec IR_eq_dec (IRU k) target). simpl. apply AAO_I_dorp; auto. -- shelve. -- shelve. + simpl. apply AAO_O; auto.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
K: Type
K_eq_dec: forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y}

Goal:
forall (l : list op) (target : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops l (acknowledge_all_ops_func l target)

Premises:
Inductive op : Type := I : K -> op | O : K -> op
Inductive acknowledge_all_ops : list op -> list IR -> Prop := AAO_nil : acknowledge_all_ops [] [] | AAO_IU : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out) | AAO_I_dorp : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) out | AAO_IO : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out) | AAO_O : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)
Inductive IR : Type := IRI : K -> IR | IRO : K -> IR | IRU : K -> IR
acknowledge_all_ops_func = fix acknowledge_all_ops_func (l : list op) (target : list IR) {struct l} : list IR := match l with | [] => [] | I k :: xs => if acknowledged_op_dec k xs then IRI k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target else if in_dec IR_eq_dec (IRU k) target then IRI k :: IRU k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target else acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target | O k :: xs => IRO k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func xs target end : list op -> list IR -> list IR Arguments acknowledge_all_ops_func (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
acknowledge_all_ops_was_in : forall (l : list op) (ir : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops l ir -> forall k : K, In (IRI k) ir -> In (I k) l
acknowledge_all_ops_ind : forall P : list op -> list IR -> Prop, P [] [] -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) out) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)) -> forall (l : list op) (l0 : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops l l0 -> P l l0
acknowledge_all_ops_sind : forall P : list op -> list IR -> SProp, P [] [] -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) out) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)) -> (forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> P tr out -> P (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)) ->...-> P l l0
Inductive acknowledge_all_ops : list op -> list IR -> Prop := AAO_nil : acknowledge_all_ops [] [] | AAO_IU : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out) | AAO_I_dorp : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) out | AAO_IO : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out ->...-> acknowledge_all_ops (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out) Arguments acknowledge_all_ops (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_IU _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_I_dorp _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_IO _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments AAO_O _ (_ _)%list_scope
AAO_O : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (O k :: tr) (IRO k :: out)
AAO_I_dorp : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) out
AAO_IO : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: out)
acknowledge_all_ops_func_defn : forall (x : op) (l : list op) (target : list IR), acknowledge_all_ops_func (x :: l) target = match x with | I k => if acknowledged_op_dec k l then IRI k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func l target else if in_dec IR_eq_dec (IRU k) target then IRI k :: IRU k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func l target else acknowledge_all_ops_func l target | O k => IRO k :: acknowledge_all_ops_func l target end
AAO_IU : forall (k : K) (tr : list op) (out : list IR), ~ acknowledged_op k tr -> acknowledge_all_ops tr out -> acknowledge_all_ops (I k :: tr) (IRI k :: IRU k :: out)
nodup_fixed_point : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A), NoDup l -> nodup decA l = l
count_occ_inv_nil : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A), (forall x : A, count_occ eq_dec l x = 0) < -> l = []
NoDup_count_occ' : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A), NoDup l < -> (forall x : A, In x l -> count_occ decA l x = 1)
count_occ_not_In : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), ~ In x l < -> count_occ eq_dec l x = 0
map2snd : ?B -> list ?A -> list (?A * ?B) where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?B : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
count_occ_In : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), In x l < -> count_occ eq_dec l x > 0
NoDup_count_occ : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A), NoDup l < -> (forall x : A, count_occ decA l x <= 1)
filter_rel : (forall x y : ?A, {?rel x y} + {~ ?rel x y}) -> ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?rel : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Relation_Definitions.relation ?A]
collate_ls : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list ?A -> (?A -> ?A -> list ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?B : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
collate : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> ?A -> (?A -> ?A -> list ?B) -> list (?A * ?B) -> ?A -> ?A -> list ?B where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?B : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
nodup_In : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), In x (nodup decA l) < -> In x l
count_occ_cons_eq : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x y : A), x = y -> count_occ eq_dec (x :: l) y = S (count_occ eq_dec l y)
list_eq_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall l l' : list A, {l = l'} + {l <> l'}
ListDec.incl_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall l l' : list A, {incl l l'} + {~ incl l l'}
a_equiv : (forall k k' : ?K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) -> list (?K * ?V) -> list (?K * ?V) -> Prop where ?K : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type] ?V : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
NoDup_remove_all : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l l' : list A), NoDup l' -> NoDup (remove_all A_eq_dec l l')
in_remove_all_was_in : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (ds l : list A) (x : A), In x (remove_all A_eq_dec ds l) -> In x l
ListDec.NoDup_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall l : list A, {NoDup l} + {~ NoDup l}
before_remove_all_if : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x y : A) (l xs : list A), before x y l -> ~ In x xs -> before x y (remove_all A_eq_dec xs l)
before_remove_all : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (x y : A) (l ys : list A), before x y (remove_all A_eq_dec ys l) -> ~ In y ys -> before x y l
nodup_inv : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (k l : list A) (a : A), nodup decA k = a :: l -> ~ In a l
subseq : list ?A -> list ?A -> Prop where ?A : [K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} |- Type]
count_occ_app : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l l' : list A) (a : A), count_occ A_eq_dec (l ++ l') a = count_occ A_eq_dec l a + count_occ A_eq_dec l' a
in_fold_left_by_cons_in : forall A B : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (l : list B) (g : B -> A) (x : A) (acc : list A), In x (fold_left (fun (a : list A) (b : B) => g b :: a) l acc) -> In x acc \/ (exists y : B, In y l /\ x = g y)
a_equiv_refl : forall (K V : Type) (K_eq_dec : forall k k' : K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) (l : list (K * V)), a_equiv K_eq_dec l l
NoDup_Permutation_collate_ls_eq : forall (A B : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (f : A -> A -> list B) (h : A) (m : B) (l' : list A), NoDup l -> Permutation l l' -> collate_ls A_eq_dec l f h m = collate_ls A_eq_dec l' f h m
subseq_remove_all : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (ds l l' : list A), subseq l l' -> subseq (remove_all A_eq_dec ds l) l'
in_remove_all_preserve : forall (A : Type) (A_eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (ds l : list A) (x : A), ~ In x ds -> In x l -> In x (remove_all A_eq_dec ds l)
NoDup_nodup : forall (A : Type) (decA : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A), NoDup (nodup decA l)
a_equiv_nil : forall (K V : Type) (K_eq_dec : forall k k' : K, {k = k'} + {k <> k'}) (l : list (K * V)), a_equiv K_eq_dec l [] -> l = []
remove_In : forall (A : Type) (eq_dec : forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) (l : list A) (x : A), ~ In x (remove eq_dec x l)

``` 
intros l target.
induction l.
- simpl. apply AAO_nil.
- destruct a.
  + destruct (acknowledged_op_dec k l).
    * simpl. apply AAO_IO; auto.
    * destruct (in_dec IR_eq_dec (IRU k) target).
      { simpl. apply AAO_IU; auto. }
      { simpl. apply AAO_I_dorp; auto. }
  + simpl. apply AAO_O; auto.
```
